cauhinh_cpu: Intel® Core™ i5-1135G7 (Upto 4.20GHz, 4 nhân 8 luồng, 8MB Cache)
cauhinh_ram: Not included, DDR4-3200 1.2V SO-DIMM up to 64GB
cauhinh_Storage: Not included, HDD & SSD, supports 2.5" HDD and M.2 PCIe x4 Gen 4" SSD
